title: Ella Mae interview and more
itunes:title: Ella Mae interview and more
description:
Today on the show we had Ella Mai stop by and she discussed her sophomore season, vulnerability, new album ‘Heart On My Sleeve’  and more. Also, we had friend to the room and health advocate Shanti Das stop by speaks on giving grace to grief, coping mechanisms, Black Children's Mental Health and more. Next, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to the man who attacked Dave Chappelle and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
